dialogue.text: (This is the tale of two boys. One named Benjamin and another named Pico.)
(Benjamin is a blue haired boy who aspires to be a painter, and Pico is an orange haired high school dropout and a notorious graffiti artist.)
(The duo have been on the run for many weeks now from Benjamin's father. It is early morning, which makes it rather hard to hide now.)
(As the sun rises from behind the city skyline, Benjamin and Pico dash into a familiar alleyway, out of breath from running so far.)
Shit, that was close.
Thank goodness he didn't catch us this time...
Wait a second, isn't this-?
-the alleyway from before?
Seems like it is.
Last time we were here nothing good hap-
(Right at that moment, the two boys hear a scream that seems to have come from the building next to the alleyway.)
Pico, did you hear that?
Yeah, I did. Seems like it came from that studio over there...
Can we... go and look inside, see what's wrong?
I don't know Softie, it could be something dangerous-
Father: Benjamin, get back here right now!!!
Alright nevermind let's go check it out-!
(They enter through the door to the studio, and they find a mouse in overalls sobbing...)
(He appears awfully familiar to the duo, but that's not important to them right now. What they need to do is get down to why he's so sad.)
Um... hello?
GAH-!
O-oh, hello there-! W-what are you two doing here?
Hey, uh... we heard a scream come from this building, and it kind of sounded like your voice. Are you okay, man...?
I... Yes, t-that was me...
B-but it's best if you get out of here. You don't wanna know what happens in this studio...
You're... you're not going to do anything to us?
Hey, how about a song to cheer you up. Would that help, sir?
W-well...
Okay then. If you think it will help...
